author: orw
msg: 122902, 122922, 122992: - <MarkManager::deleteMark(..)> - assure that entry is removed from stl container before its deletion is triggered.
- <SwTrnsfrDdeLink::Disconnect(..)> - do not delete DDE bookmark when it is already in its destruction

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-4197 Enforce permission check on Configuration.get/setBundleLocation.
Implicit permission is only applicable to CRUD on configuration itself.
